athlets.title: Connection
athlets.text: Connect with coaches directly, you can ping coaches to view profile.

athlets.title: Collaboration
athlets.text: Work with other student athletes to increase visability. When you share and like other players videos it will increase your visability as a player. This is the team work aspect to Surface 1.

athlets.title: Growth
athlets.text: Resources and tools for you to get better as a student Athelte. Access to training classes, tutor sessions, etc

players.title: Connection
players.text: Connect with talented athlete directly, you can watch their skills through video showreels directly from Surface 1.

players.title: Collaboration
players.text: Work with recruiter to increase your chances of finding talented athlete.

players.title: Growth
players.text: Save your time, recruit proper athlets for your team.
